channel.title: Come here For All The Help you can get!
channel.description:
Well, For all the help you can get, you've came to the right place.
1 Step) Compiling Problems? --- Okay,
Open Computer Properties , then Advanced System Settings' then Computer " Variables ", When youv'e done that, Click On Add : In Top Box, Put " PATH" Second box put -- YOUR CLASSPATH SETTING IN! MUST PUT YOUR SETTING'S IN!..
Portforward: Go to Moparscape Homepage, Then Server Download's, Then Go to Page 5-10, Find " Server Creator Program ", Or PortForward At " Routerlogin.com.
Then, To Get The programs, Programming is Easy. Download No-ip.DUC & UTorrent.
Http://www.google.com/UtorrentDownload Http://www.google.com/No-ip.DUCdownload Http://No-ip.com -- Register an account, and click Host/Directs.
More information will be giving at MSN : Tester100230@yahoo.com Or, DIY
:D, This is little help, but aload of help from my Messenger,.. Thanks For Coming.

@Mercifies wrote:

This will get locked… The help section doesn’t allow posts that are people throwing out posts that help a specific question. The help section has the person ask the question and we answer. This will probably get locked.

item.title: Come here For All The Help you can get!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

You can’t post these kinds of things in the Server Help section.
Server Help section is here for people to make topics about problems they have whilst making their server. Unless it’s a compiler issue, in which they must post their problem as a reply to the big sticky topic at the top of the help page.
We help people by replying to their topics, not making our own “spam” topic. :l

Read full topic
item.source: Come here For All The Help you can get!
